snippet: A crowd burned vehicles and clashed with the police after a bus reportedly struck and killed a foreign worker.
abstract: Crowd in Singapore sets fire to vehicles and clashes with the police after a private bus struck and killed a foreign worker; disturbance is a rare outbreak of violence in city-state.
lead_paragraph: A crowd burned vehicles and clashed with the police after a bus reportedly struck and killed a foreign worker.

headline.main: Crowd Battles Police in Singapore District
headline.print_headline: Crowd Battles Police In Singapore District
